Receive mobile speedcam alerts in real time and be warned against all fixed speed cameras worldwide.âââââ NEW: CamSam PLUS available - ADVANTAGES âââââ[â] Verified speedcam alerts, therefore more relaxed traveling[â] Landscape mode, simply turn your smartphone 90Â°[â] Even faster updates in case of software bugs[â] New features will always be available in the PLUS version firstâââââ Look for CamSam PLUS in the MARKET âââââInstall CamSam for free now and be part of the large community of over 5 million participants all over the world.Review: http://goo.gl/8nFtCâââââ OVERVIEW OF FUNCTIONS âââââ- Real time alerts of mobile radar traps- More than 58.000 fixed speedcams worldwide from SCDB.info- Directional alerts for all fixed speedcams- Automatic updates every 5 minutes- Visual and acoustic warnings- Indication of device type and of legal speed limit- Simple alert function- Online/offline mode - Locations of fixed speedcams checked on site- Listening and radar view- Distance and direction of speedcam indicatedSystem requirements:- Android operating system 2.x or higher- Internet access for online updates (flat rate recommended)- Internal GPS

reviews.title: Very good, works great on samsung note 2
reviews.comment: A lot of very precise warnings in bulgaria.  Super app. Mnogo cameri i svetofari sa veche vkarani. Jakooo! Must use app! Polzvam go winagi na put
reviews.author: Assen V

reviews.title: Fantastic App!
reviews.comment: Really accurate for Androids but a lot to improve on Windows 8 mbl version.
reviews.author: Mariana Arizmendi

reviews.title: A bit disappointing
reviews.comment: Loaded on Samsung S3 mini. So far this is the best app I have tried and it does pick up all the speed cameras in my west Yorkshire location plus a few that no longer exist. It appears to work on a proximity method as it advises cameras which are on the opposite side of the road and also camera which are on adjacent roads within 500metre. The male voice warnings are a bit low and difficult to understand I believe a female voice would be better. Although you select \342\200\234mph\342\200\235 the warning are still in metre to camera. The report function is not very useful as trying to send a report of a camera etc., whilst driving is dangerous and illegal in the UK.   I will continue to use this app until I can find something better as it does report the camera locations. I hope people don\342\200\231t think this is too critical but I am use to a gadget which could tell the direction I was travelling and only reported the cameras which I need to know. Pity they stop the update function.
reviews.author: Paul Dodgson

reviews.title: Better than many paid apps
reviews.comment: As the heading says  it works perfectly  in uk  I had this and a app I paid \302\2437  for  this worked  the other didnt detect anything  jus goes to show paid vs  free  this  is the best I have tried out of  around 5 apps for speed cams

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Excellent app. So far almost spot on on every camera. Only drawback is that the app dont understand that there is in finland a different speedlimit depending on if its summer or winter time.
